name: INV_CLM_ICN
description: This table holds information of claim override internal control number (ICN) on A/R Invoice (INV) for Resolute Professional Billing.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CLM_OVRD_ICN_CVG_ID
columns.description: The override coverage ID for the internal control number for the claim.

columns.name: CLM_OVERRIDE_ICN
columns.description: The override internal control number for the claim.

columns.name: CLM_OVRD_ICN_T_DTTM
columns.description: The override edit time for the internal control number for the claim.

columns.name: CLM_OVRD_ICN_USR_ID
columns.description: The override edit user for the internal control number for the claim.

columns.name: CLM_OVRD_ICN_USR_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: CLM_OVRD_ICN_IGN_YN
columns.description: Whether or not the override for the internal control number for the claim was ignored.

columns.name: CLM_OVRD_ICN_CMNT
columns.description: The override comment for the internal control number for the claim.
